DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine long-term safety efficacy VI-0521 ( phentermine/topiramate ) compare placebo provide blood sugar control Type 2 diabetic adult . Continuation initial 6 month trial .
DOC.brief_title: A VI-0521 Study Evaluate Long-term Safety Efficacy Type 2 Diabetic Adults
DOC.criteria: Have complete qualify OB202 trial If female childbearing potential , subject must use adequate contraception Provide write informed consent Be willing able comply schedule study visit , treatment plan , lab test study procedure Subjects develop one morbidity OB202 trial would pose safety concern
